title: image resize
creator: ian37
content:
Dear Sir/Madam, 

      Have been using Thunderbird since it's inception . I have appreciated the "add-ons" which shrink picture file size in the desktop version. Having used Thunderbird for android for a year now I am most frustrated at the inability to utilise this sort of function on android. An email photograph is so helpful in many situations. Am I missing something or do you intend to implement such a function.    Kind regards Ian

title: address book

content: How do I find/edit my address book on the phone (Google Pixel 6 with Thunderbird app)?
